meanings.definition: The state or quality of being heterogeneous.
meanings.sent1: The heterogenies of the forest were evident in the variety of trees and plants.
meanings.sent2: The heterogenies of opinions in the group led to a lively discussion.
meanings.sent3: The heterogenies of colors in her wardrobe made her outfit look like a rainbow.
meanings.sent4: The heterogenies of talents in the team created a symphony of skills.
meanings.sent5: The heterogenies of flavors in the dish made it a culinary adventure.

meanings.definition: A lack of uniformity or similarity.
meanings.sent1: The heterogenies of sizes in the collection made it unique.
meanings.sent2: The heterogenies of interests among the students made the class dynamic.
meanings.sent3: The heterogenies of sounds in the room created a cacophony of noise.
meanings.sent4: The heterogenies of shapes in the artwork formed a captivating mosaic.
meanings.sent5: The heterogenies of textures in the fabric added depth to the design.
